Emergency Appeals for witnesses in a rural Southland town, following damage to power infrastructure Appeals for witnesses in a rural Southland town, following damage to power infrastructure 16 August 2024 Police in Winton believe the structures were damaged on seven streets between midnight and 12.30am on Wednesday morning They're urging people to come forward with any information. >> More ???1;A person has died after a two-vehicle crash in Whangarei 15 Aug: SPCA's Taupo Centre closed today, after a man demanding the return of his dog yesterday threatened to burn the building down 15 Aug: Police have launched a homicide investigation following the death of two people at a home in Turangi, south of Taupo, overnight 15 Aug: Police are making enquiries after a phone threat caused Wellington Hospital to go into lockdown overnight 15 Aug: People wanting to go through Greymouth today on State Highway 7 will need to take a detour route 14 Aug: Two planes have crashed on a Waikato
